name: onion.http
description: Connect compatible HTTP middleware stack based on onion
readme:
# Onion HTTP

Onion HTTP is a
[connect](https://github.com/senchalabs/connect)
compatible HTTP middleware stack based on
[onion](https://github.com/niclashoyer/onion).

## Installation

```plaintext
npm install onion.http
```

## Usage

The API is very similar to other HTTP middleware stacks:

```coffeescript
Onion   = require 'onion'
http    = require 'onion.http'
router  = require 'copperhead'
connect = require 'connect'

app = new Onion
app.construct http

app.use connect.logger 'dev'
app.use router

router.get ->
	"Hello World!"

app.listen 3000
```
